note.p: American school teacher and botanist. A Quaker. Taught science at the Moses Brown School, Providence, Rhode Island from 1868. Member of the Botanical Committee of the Providence Franklin Society. Collected phanerogams.
Harvard University Herbaria & Libraries, Index of botanists (http://kiki.huh.harvard.edu/databases/botanist_index.html, accessed 2 August 2016)
U.S. Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 August 2016)
